flawed_nl_solution:
First hour = 66 apples
Second hour = 66(2) = 123 apples
Third hour = 66(1/3) = 22 apples
Total number of apples picked 66+123+22=<<66+123+22=211>>211 apples

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 132, not 123. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
